projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Naruto Swagger App
projects.bodyText:
- A swagger documentation application that gives access to set of API that gives out different names and famous quotes as said by the characters of Anime named NARUTO.
 - Uses the FastAPI architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Notes App -  Built with React
projects.bodyText:
- A note taking app with complete state management. Followed all best practices of React.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **Okta**.
 - Deployed on **vercel**.

projects.title: Cafe Management App
projects.bodyText:
- A desktop application for cafe management.
 - It manages everyday order and also has ability to print reciepts of the orders on demand.

projects.title: Image to PDF Telegram Bot
projects.bodyText:
- A telegram bot that converts images to PDF.
 - Prompts the user to send the image and it will convert it to PDF.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A Student Management System built with **Java** and **Spring Boot**.
 - It also records the employee who is managing the student data.
 - Used Hibernate and SQL for data management.
